If Trump directed officials to “slow the testing down” for COVID-19, then we need to know about it.

So I'm asking officials one more time: has Trump or anyone at the White House pushed for COVID-19 resources to be used for political reasons—including by limiting testing?

Now is not a time for half steps and half measures when it comes to fixing our broken system of policing. We need comprehensive reform that will bring transformative change—that’s what I’m fighting for with @KamalaHarris & our Justice in Policing Act. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EbM3I6vWoAEk_Hz.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1275422451502063616/vid/320x320/AxpttK5v63UYY2Ap.mp4?tag=13

Over 120,000 Americans have died of COVID-19. Cases are still rising in over 25 states. And not having enough testing has made this crisis worse. We need to know if the President or his political team have undermined efforts to contain this virus.

Trump’s comments about slowing down COVID-19 testing were disgusting. They're even worse if his cronies listened to him. We want @OIGatHHS to review all @HHSGov programs related to COVID-19 testing to see if anything was slowed down by political pressure. https://www.cnn.com/2020/06/22/politics/senate-democrats-hhs-investigate-trump-testing/index.html

But plants not only failed to implement worker protections as people got sick – they fought for an executive order to stay open & waivers to put more workers on the line. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Eai1a46WkAADicy.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1272459458548039680/vid/480x270/nAN-x8cPE7DMhAVT.mp4?tag=13
